items.name: REMIX'd Dance Class
items.introduction: Learn popular dances ranging from the cha cha to the grapevine, courtesy of our onboard dance pros.
items.shortDescription: A dance class that gets your hips grooving.
items.longDescription: This remixed dance class is all about getting your feet moving and putting you in the party mindset. Learn 2-step dances like the cha cha, the grapevine, and other adult-friendly moves, grooving to music that's sure to keep the deck bopping.

items.name: Shore Things Bookings Help Desk
items.introduction: Visit our help desk for assistance booking Shore Things.
items.shortDescription: Booking Shore Things is easy at our help desk.
items.longDescription: Shore Things are one of the most fun parts of the voyage, and we're making it easier than ever to book them. Just visit our help desk for any questions about our Shore Things, and assistance booking them.

items.name: Solo Sailor: Morning Meetup
items.introduction: Let us jump-start your morning with coffee — and a mixer to connect you with other solo Sailors.
items.shortDescription: Start your day with fellow solo Sailors.
items.longDescription: BYOC (Bring Your Own Coffee) and enjoy a hit of caffeine with a side of shiny new friendship. At this meetup hosted by our Happenings Cast, you can sip your choice of tea, coffee, or espresso as we discuss the day’s happenings. (And keep an eye out for more chances to mingle with other solo Sailors as the voyage continues).

items.name: Merry Morning Mind Benders
items.introduction: The holiday season is a time for giving. Give yourself the gift of fun when you mingle with fellow Sailors for some low-key morning brain boosters.
items.shortDescription: Wake your brain up (gently) with some games.
items.longDescription: Enjoying the relaxation of your voyage but trying to make sure your mind stays sharp? Come enjoy this holiday brain-teaser session. We'll lay out an array of challenges that includes riddles, anagrams, crosswords, sudoku, geography quizzes, and more — all with a festive holiday twist. Bring a friend, or go solo and make friends while solving a tough crossword clue together.

items.name: Let’s Mushroom Around - Book On Board!
Pickleball
items.introduction: Quick to learn, social, and a lot of fun, Pickleball is a fast-paced sport that combines elements of tennis, badminton, and ping-pong.
items.shortDescription: Discover the world's latest sports obsession.
items.longDescription: Put on some comfy clothes and get ready to break a sweat because you're about to fall in love with Pickleball — the world's latest sports obsession. For this self guided session, all you need to play is a couple of paddles, a ball, and a net, and we got it all ready and waiting for you at the Sports Court on Deck 16. But before joining us for a match, you must know one (very important) thing: learning to play Pickleball is incredibly easy... the hard part is stopping. Trust us, we know.
needToKnows: Pickleball is open to all Sailors on a first come first serve basis.
Please be mindful of your time on the court if others are waiting to play.
This will be a self-guided session.

items.name: Latin Dance Class 101
items.introduction: Get ready to step, sweat, and shake your natural assets in this Latin-infused dance session — all levels welcome.
items.shortDescription: Now's the chance to get up and dance — Latin-style
items.longDescription: It doesn’t matter if you’re a constant wallflower or if rhythm just pulsates through your veins — it’s time to hit the deck by learning (or improving) sensational dance skills. This partners-optional sesh gives you the chance to meet new people in a judgment-free zone that celebrates music, dance, and of course, the Latin spirit. After a warm up, you’ll learn the basics followed by Salsa or Bachata — and after a few minutes, you’ll feel like you’ve been dancing all your life in no time.

items.name: Roaming Magic with The Charmer
items.introduction: The Charmer keeps you captivated with his impromptu magic performances around the ship.
items.shortDescription: Casual encounters with the ship's resident charmer
items.longDescription: The Charmer is not only our lady ship's resident magician, but also the consummate host. You may be charmed by the impromptu close-up magic, or perhaps it’s The Charmer’s mystifying personality that draws you in. So keep your eyes peeled; these roaming magic performances throughout the ship can mystify you at the most unexpected moments.

items.name: Salty Trivia: Planet Please
items.introduction: Dive into “Salty Trivia: Planet Please” a fun, fast-paced quiz on wild animals, space, weather, and science! Ready to test your brain?
items.shortDescription: A trivia trip through nature and the cosmos.
items.longDescription: From black holes to blue whales, “Salty Trivia: Planet Please” blasts off on a brainy adventure through all things science and nature. Expect curious creatures, mind-blowing space facts, wild weather, and a splash of chemistry (the science kind, not the flirting kind… unless?). Whether you’re a nature nerd or just here to orbit some fun, this quiz is your chance to flex that big beautiful brain of yours. Warning: may cause a sudden urge to watch a documentary.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting the event on the app, it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

items.name: Keep Calm and Color On
items.introduction: Coloring is not just for kids! The Artist brings the joy of coloring back into your heart!
items.shortDescription: Get creative and color with the Artist.
items.longDescription: Vacation should always include some relaxation, and what better way than to revisit the childhood favorite of coloring! Pick your medium of choice and and let your inner kid run wild!

items.name: Shuffleboard Showdown
items.introduction: Shuffle down to the Social Club for an epic shuffleboard tournament hosted by the Happenings Cast.
items.shortDescription: Test your skills in a shuffleboard tournament.
items.longDescription: Proud of your shuffleboard skills? Or maybe you're just looking for some competitive practice? Head down to the Social Club for a shuffleboard tournament, where you'll compete in teams of two in multiple rounds of Knock Off. See who has the best strategy to come out on top, and bring home a special prize from our Happenings Cast.

items.name: Guest Artist: Selkii
items.introduction: Definition of Selkii-centered 1: able to live-loop tunes from ABBA to Zeppelin 2: capable of providing (a band) for her own needs 3: Selkii-sufficient
items.shortDescription: A one-woman band with an impressive soundscape.
items.longDescription: Live-looping tunes from a catalog of over 1,600 songs, Selkii is a one-woman band with an impressive soundscape. With only her guitar, insane vocals, and mad improvisational skills, she isn't afraid to take a request, spice it up with some Selkii-original flair, and make it her own. And after getting Adam Levine's chair to turn on The Voice 2019, making waves on #TeamBlake, stealing the show on South African IDOL, and getting Macy Gray's praise, she is about to win your heart.

items.name: Ship Hop with the Balancer
items.introduction: Move and groove to your favorite hip-hop and pop hits in this high-energy dance class.
items.shortDescription: An electrifying hip-hop dance party.
items.longDescription: Get ready to hit the dance floor and unleash your inner star! This electrifying class will have everyone feeling like a pop star, boy band sensation, hip-hop icon, or video vixen. With high-energy beats and easy-to-follow choreography, you'll groove, pop, and lock to the rhythm of your favorite hip-hop and pop hits. Whether you're a seasoned dancer or just love to move, this class is all about dancing like no one’s watching.

items.name: The Big Remix
items.introduction: Join our Happenings Cast for a high-energy music game show full of chaos, covers, and pop madness.
items.shortDescription: A wild music game show with remixes and pop chaos!
items.longDescription: This isn’t your average trivia, it's The Big Remix. A wild, high-energy music game show where Sailors face off in rounds like “Music Time Machine” and “Boogie For The Record.” Expect lyric lies, cover chaos, and remix mayhem in a pop culture battle of memory, music, and madness.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.
Doors open 15 minutes prior to the show.
And just FYI, in case it may be an issue for anyone, fog effects will be used.
Just an FYI for those possibly impacted — strobe, lasers and CO2 effects will be used.
Because of the nature of this being an immersive experience, please use caution when moving around the room before, during and after the performance.

items.name: Queen HD the DJ at the Aquatic Club
items.introduction: Vibe out in the midday sun with strangers, lovers, and everyone in between.
items.shortDescription: A splash of afternoon sunshine.
items.longDescription: At the Aquatic Club, it's all about good energy. You'll hear a mix of current and classic pop, Latin, reggae, hip-hop (of the chill variety), dance, minimal house music, and remixes. Perfect for poolside lounging — cocktail optional.

items.name: Latte, You Stay!
items.introduction: In this java-centered competition, showmanship is key. Join The Happenings cast and your onboard baristas to test your coffee knowhow and win a prize.
items.shortDescription: An interactive, highly-caffeinated gameshow.
items.longDescription: The Roundabout is center stage for this battle royale for a free spiked latte and the grand title of Grounds Master. Four lucky Sailors will be plucked from the crowd to participate in a series of coffee-related challenges, ranging from trivia to walking the runway with a hot latte in hand. You'll even work with a barista to create the wildest custom foam art imaginable. The Sailor with the most beans* in their cup** (points* on their board**) at the end of the game wins the coveted prize.

items.name: Seas the Knowledge: Progressive Trivia
items.introduction: Play the long game, and test your trivia stamina!
items.shortDescription: Test your trivia knowledge throughout the voyage.
items.longDescription: Enter if you dare our first Progressive Trivia challenge where Sailors will compete daily, and tally scores throughout the entire voyage to crown a winner!

items.name: Painting & Boozy Bevvies: ($ USD) - Book On Board!
Golden Hour Grooves at The Dock
items.introduction: Join our DJ for a set of downtempo grooves to complement the day.
items.shortDescription: Unwind dockside as our DJ sets the perfect vibe.
items.longDescription: Head to the Dock for the perfect mix of chill and groove as our DJ spins a mix designed to complement the day, and ease you into the night.

items.name: Horseplay Race
items.introduction: It’s off to the track for a (sea)horse race with a wild and boisterous twist.
items.shortDescription: Derby-style live seahorse racing with a twist.
items.longDescription: And by races, we mean our faux-horse track, complete with seahorses. Dust off your Derby best and come cheer on your favorite (sea)horse. After the dice are rolled, the owners are tasked with a variety of challenges or given the option to spin the wheel and compete to move the seahorses forward. It’s ridiculous, it’s wild and in the end, there can only be one winner.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

items.name: Pop Quiz: Decade's Music Trivia
items.introduction: Test your pop music savvy in this high-energy quiz featuring today’s biggest hits and viral anthems—no throwbacks, just pure chart fun!
items.shortDescription: Name the top tracks from this century.
items.longDescription: Think you know your modern chart-toppers? Step up and show off in this pop-fueled quiz packed with iconic hits, unforgettable hooks, and serious sing-along energy. From viral bangers to powerhouse vocals and everything in between, it’s a celebration of the songs you can’t stop streaming. Whether you’re a music buff or just love a good beat drop, this is your moment to shine. No throwbacks here, just pure, current pop brilliance.

items.name: VV Cabaret: Featuring the Hostess
items.introduction: Our resident Hostess will serenade you with a selection songs while you sit, sip, and savor.
items.shortDescription: Libations and musical vibrations with the Hostess.
items.longDescription: As you sip your favorite drink, immerse yourself in an electric atmosphere brought to life by the fabulous Hostess from your Happenings Cast. Featuring a captivating collection of songs and stories, this experience offers the perfect blend of entertainment and elegance aboard our stylish lady ship.
needToKnows: This event is on a first-come, first-served basis.
We will be using a virtual queue to manage the entrance.

items.name: Salty Trivia: Musicals, Darling!
items.introduction: Step into the spotlight with "Salty Trivia: Musicals, Darling" a dazzling quiz night for theatre lovers and show tune fans at sea!
items.shortDescription: An All That Jazz quiz for Musical Lovers.
items.longDescription: From Broadway belters to West End wonders, "Salty Trivia: Musicals, Darling" is your all-singing, all-dancing chance to shine. Test your knowledge of iconic show tunes, legendary performers, and toe-tapping trivia from the stage’s biggest hits. Whether you’re a theatre nerd, drama queen, or just here for the jazz hands, this glittering game will leave you humming for more. So warm up those vocal cords it’s showtime, baby!
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting the event on the app, it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

items.name: Duel Reality
items.introduction: “Two households, both alike in dignity... where civil blood makes civil hands unclean” ...
items.shortDescription: First Come, First Serve.
items.longDescription: Created and produced by The 7 Fingers, Duel Reality is a fast-paced retelling of Romeo and Juliet—with an elaborate circus twist. By stripping this love story down to the core of its conflict and dropping the action into a sporting arena, both the thrills and the danger are heightened. You'll have ringside seats to the graceful and death-defying acts while witnessing the two groups grapple with a heart-pounding desire to rise above one another.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.
For safety, Deck 6 access will be prohibited once the show has begun. If you arrive late, you must use the Deck 7 entrance.
Keep your hands to yourself! NO touching of any cast/performer/crew member or Sailor.
Just FYI, strobe lights, lasers and CO2 effects will be used. If that is an issue for anyone, please be advised.

items.name: Guest Artists: Dustin Monk & The Hustle
items.introduction: From turning chairs on "The Voice" to turning heads in the music industry, Dustin Monk & The Hustle brings Hollywood rock experience to Virgin Voyages
items.shortDescription: A rock ensemble with the heartbeat of soul and R&B
items.longDescription: Rising to fame on Season 9 of NBC's "The Voice," Dustin managed to catch the attention and turn the chairs of Blake Shelton and Adam Levine. Now he's doing more than turning chairs -- he's filling them with fans all around the country. Rooted in rock n' roll, the catchy sound of Dustin Monk & The Hustle is also inspired by a fusion of Blues, Soul, Funk, and R&B.

items.name: Double Trouble
items.introduction: Join the Happenings Cast for a game show that tests whether you really know your loved ones.
items.shortDescription: See if you really know your other half.
items.longDescription: Think you know all your husband's secrets? Truly believe your sibling shares everything with you? Learn the truth by playing this game show that tests your knowledge of your spouses, partners, siblings, and friends. Prove you know them as well as you think you do, or discover some new dark secrets.

items.name: Murder in the Manor
items.introduction: Murder in the Manor is a 80s glam-slasher extravaganza packed with killer looks, fierce dance breaks, and enough synth to wake the dead.
items.shortDescription: A murder mystery soaked in 80s glitz and glamour.
items.longDescription: Welcome to the most fabulous crime scene of the decade. Murder in the Manor isn’t just a show— murder mystery soaked in 80s glitz and dripping with drama. Beneath the shoulder pads and smoky eye lies a deadly secret… and everyone’s a suspect. With over-the-top dance numbers, savage twists, and synth-pop bangers that refuse to die prepare for a glamorously gory night you won’t forget. This isn’t just a whodunit—it’s a who’s-next.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open at the posted start time, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Fog effects will be used.
Just an FYI for those possibly impacted —strobe, lasers and CO2 effects will be used.
Because of the nature of this being an immersive experience, please use caution when moving around the room before, during and after the performance.
Keep your hands to yourself! NO touching of any cast/performer/crew member or Sailor.
For better show enjoyment, doors will be closed once capacity is reached.

items.name: Guest Artist: Taylor Reed
items.introduction: Groove to the soulful sounds of Taylor Reed as she weaves violin melodies with percussion beats!
items.shortDescription: Soulful strings and angelic vocals.
items.longDescription: Hailing from Tampa, FL, Taylor Reed channels her natural creativity and spontaneity through a looping station, building an elegantly layered, engrossingly soulful sound. Weaving violin melodies, bold and invigorating percussion, and angelic vocals through groove-infused creations, her pop/R&B music elevates any space.

items.name: Duel Reality
items.introduction: “Two households, both alike in dignity... where civil blood makes civil hands unclean” ...
items.shortDescription: First Come, First Serve.
items.longDescription: Created and produced by The 7 Fingers, Duel Reality is a fast-paced retelling of Romeo and Juliet—with an elaborate circus twist. By stripping this love story down to the core of its conflict and dropping the action into a sporting arena, both the thrills and the danger are heightened. You'll have ringside seats to the graceful and death-defying acts while witnessing the two groups grapple with a heart-pounding desire to rise above one another.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.
For safety, Deck 6 access will be prohibited once the show has begun. If you arrive late, you must use the Deck 7 entrance.
Keep your hands to yourself! NO touching of any cast/performer/crew member or Sailor.
Just FYI, strobe lights, lasers and CO2 effects will be used. If that is an issue for anyone, please be advised.

items.name: Karaoke with the Happenings Cast
items.introduction: Sing your heart out, Sailors.
items.shortDescription: It's an onboard karaoke night, Sailors.
items.longDescription: Just by being here on board, you're a bonafide star. Don't even try to fight it, it's the truth. So indulge that very truth and join the Happenings Cast for a wild night of tunes, trills, and togetherness. Everyone has their favorite karaoke song, so come show us yours. And your star power behind it.

items.name: Guest Artist: Kennedi & the Groove
items.introduction: This fearless band isn't afraid to swerve across decades and musical genres during live sets that cover everything from funk, to pop and disco.
items.shortDescription: Funk, pop, disco, and rock hits sung with soul.
items.longDescription: Kennedi & The Groove has its origins at sea in 2021. On board a Cruise Ship where Kennedi met the four piece band that will later be known as The Groove. The connection was instant and together they created a headliner show and started to work on their repertoire with the goal of working on cruises. After a 3 month period in a 5 star hotel in South Korea, they were able to achieve what they've been working towards for almost 2 years, a contract with Virgin Voyages.

items.name: Bingo Blitz - After Dark
items.introduction: Join our Happenings Cast for Bingo Blitz: After Dark - bingo with a wild twist! Play, party, and dance as the night transforms into a DJ-fueled club.
items.shortDescription: Bingo Blitz is a bingo nightclub experience.
items.longDescription: Leave the dusty bingo hall behind, Bingo Blitz: After Dark is a full-throttle, immersive nightclub experience where chaos is always just one number away. This is classic bingo turned up to eleven. When the final number drops, the party doesn’t stop. The night rolls straight into a DJ-fuelled club.
needToKnows: Bingo card purchases are made through the "Bingo Blitz: After Dark - Card Sales" event in the Sailor App.
Bingo Card Sales end prior to the show.
Once show starts cards can no longer be purchased.
There is a cost to purchase bingo cards.
Keep your hands to yourself! NO touching of any cast/performer/crew member or Sailor.
And just FYI, in case it may be an issue for anyone, fog effects will be used.
Just an FYI for those possibly impacted — strobe, lasers and CO2 effects will be used.
Because of the nature of this being an immersive experience, please use caution when moving around the room before, during and after the performance.
You'll be dancing and/or standing for the duration of this experience, so dress in something relatively comfortable.
Deck 7 will be kept for those not playing bingo to enjoy the Vibes and Music!
